Text: I don't know what the deal is, but the Internet right now is ridiculous.  I am uploading at like 30bk/s with spikes up to 500kb/s, and then back down.  Hopefully it will get better.  Either way, expect a slow upload.  Please be patient!
Thanks a pile! I prefer consistency, so having them all be the same like this is terrific; especially since they are XviD.
